name: CHRONOSHOT
description:
CHRONOSHOT is a score-driven sci-fi arena shooting game, with specialized time mechanics. The player is equipped with a Jetpack, several weapons, and special ammunition which can be used to turn the tide against the enemy and dominate the leader board!

This is an early access version featuring some of the single player gameplay. Multiplayer gameplay modes, more levels, and more customization options are coming soon!

  • Master Time - Time moves when you do! Take a break, analyze the battlefield, and plan your next move -- or grab enemy bullets from the air to refill your ammo.
  • Feel the Power - Get progressively more powerful the more you play! As your power grows, so can your score!
  • Diverse Gameplay - With different guns, enemy actions, and abilities each round of play is a new experience! Cheese enemies too much, and they defensively adapt forcing you to change tactics!
  • Combos and Multipliers - Not only do you need to survive swarms of enemies, but to find yourself atop the leaderboard you need to optimize your strategy to generate combo bonuses and multipliers.
  • Aim for the Top - Challenge friends and strangers to reach and hold the top spots in the high score charts.
  • Only the Beginning – More is in development and coming soon, including multiplayer modes, more character customization, new guns, new maps, and new types of abilities!
